caption.p: Mineral composition of yam ( Dioscorea species).

fn.p: K: potassium, Na: sodium, P: phosphorus, Ca: calcium, Mg: magnesium, Cu: cupper, Fe: iron, Mn: manganese, Zn: zinc, NR: not reported, 1 dry weight, 2 fresh weight, 3 Sample type: not specified, D. polystachya: Chinese yam formerly known as D. opposita and D. batatas.
